title: Provided that no such increase in open spaces is necessary if (i) it is a front margin or (ii) when only store rooms and stairways derive light and ventilation from the open space
clause_text: Provided that no such increase in open spaces is necessary if (i) it is a front margin or (ii) when only store rooms and stairways derive light and ventilation from the open space.
